Detailed Description

template<class V, class T, class A>
class Geom< V, T, A >

The Geom class extends the Visual class by adding a mesh data.

This in the form of a Trimesh that can be rendered by the renderer.

Geoms can be used in both 2D and 3D scenegraph. They should take Vec2/Vec3, Trfm2/Trfm3 and App2/App3 as template parameters to compile correctly.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

template<class V , class T , class A >
void Geom< V, T, A >::setBounds ( SPtr< BoundingVolume< V > > &  bounds ) [virtual]

Sets this Geom's BoundingVolume.

DO NOT call this AFTER this Geom has been scaled. New bounds assume that the model has a scale of 1!

Parameters:
boundsBoundingVolume to give to this Geom

Reimplemented from Bound< V >.

int  from,
int  to 
) [virtual]

Update this Geom's BoundingVolume.

Geom's are leaf nodes, so childBounds will be empty.
